summary: This category focuses on the concept of ecosystems in various contexts, including biological, digital, and organizational realms. The resources here explore how decentralized and non-hierarchical structures are becoming increasingly prevalent in different sectors. Learn about ecosystem architecture, a multidisciplinary approach to tackling modern challenges, and stay tuned for future explorations on the impact of internet fragmentation.
excerpt: Ecosystems describe decentralized, non-hierarchical organizations. Ecosystem architecture, inspired by various disciplines, addresses modern challenges and will be explored in future articles.
